verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mun aiki Nũhu zuwa ga mutãnensa, cẽwa ka yi gargaɗi ga mutãnenka gabãnin wata azãba mai raɗaɗi ta zo musu.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena ni, a gare ku, mai gargaɗi ne, mai bayyanãwa."

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.english: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.
verses.hausa: "Cewa ku bauta wa Allah, ku ji tsõronSa, kuma ku bĩ ni."

verses.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "
verses.hausa: "Allah zai gãfarta muku daga zunubanku kuma Ya jinkirta muku zuwa ga ajalin da aka ambata. Lalle ne ajalin Allah idan ya zo, ba za a jinkirta Shi ba, dã kun kasance masana (ga abin da nake faɗã dã, kun bar kãfirci)."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.
verses.hausa: Nũhu) ya ce: "Ya Ubangijina! Lalle ne, na kirãyi mutãnena, a cikin dare da yini."

verses.arabic: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.english: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
verses.hausa: "To, amma kirana bai ƙãre su ba sai da, gudu (daga gare ni)."

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.english: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne ni, kõ da yaushe na kirãye su dõmin Ka gãfarta musu, sai su sanya yatsunsu a cikin kunnuwansu, su lulluɓe da tufãfinsu, su dõge ga yin laifi. Sun yi girman kai iyãkar girman kai."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.english: Then I invited them publicly.
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan lalle ne ni, na kira su, a bayyane."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.english: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan lalle ne, na yi yẽkuwa sabõda su, kuma na gãna da su a cikin asĩri."

verses.arabic: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.english: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
verses.hausa: "Shi na ce, 'Ku nẽmi gãfara daga Ubangijinku, lalle ne shi Ya kasance Mai gãfara ne."

verses.arabic: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.english: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers
verses.hausa: "Ya sako (girgijen) sama a kanku da ruwa mai ɓuɓɓuga."

verses.arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
verses.english: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ya yalwata muku game da dũkiya da ɗiya, Ya sanya muku (albarka) ga gõnaki, kuma Ya sanya muku koguna."

verses.arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.english: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur
verses.hausa: "Me ya sãme ku, bã ku fãtar sãmun natsuwa daga Allah,"

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.english: While He has created you in stages?
verses.hausa: "Alhãli kuwa, lalle ne, Ya halitta. ku, a cikin hãlãye?"

verses.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.english: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
verses.hausa: "Ba ku ga yadda Allah Ya halitta wasu sammai bakwai ɗabaƙõƙĩ a kan jũna ba?"

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.english: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?
verses.hausa: "Ya sanya watã a cikinsu, yana mai haske, Ya sanya rãnã babbar fitila?"

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.english: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.
verses.hausa: "Kuma Allah Ya tsirar da ku daga ƙasa (kamar ganye) tsirarwa."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.english: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan Ya mayar da ku a cikinta, kuma Ya fitar da ku fitarwa."

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.english: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse
verses.hausa: "Kuma Allah Ya sanya muku ƙasa shimfidaɗɗiya."

verses.arabic: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.english: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "
verses.hausa: "Dõmin ku shiga a cikinta, hanyõyi mãsu fãɗi."

verses.arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.english: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.
verses.hausa: Nũhu ya ce: "Ya Ubangijina! Lalle ne sũ sun saɓa mini sun bi wanda dukiyarsa da ɗiyansa ba su ƙãre shi da kõme ba sai da hasãra."

verses.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.english: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.
verses.hausa: "Kuma sun yi wani mãkirci, mãkirci babba."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.english: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.
verses.hausa: "Kuma suka ce: Faufau kada ku bar gumãkanku, kuma faufau, kada ku bar wadda, kuma kada ku bar suwã kuma kada ku bar Yagũsa da Ya'ũƙa da Nasra."

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
verses.english: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne sun ɓatar da (mutãne) mãsu yawa, kuma kada Ka ƙãrã wa azzãlumai (kõme) sai ɓata."

verses.arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.english: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.
verses.hausa: Sabõda laifukansu na ganganci aka nutsar da su, sa'an nan aka sanya su a wuta. Saboda haka ba su sãmã wa kansu wani mataimaki wanin Allah ba.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.english: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
verses.hausa: Kuma Nũhu ya ce: "Ya Ublngijina! Kada Ka bari, a kan ƙasa, daga cikin kãfirai, wanda ke zama a cikin gida."

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.english: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, Kai idan Ka bar su, zã su ɓatar da bãyinKa, kuma bã zã su haifi kowa ba fãce fãjiri mai yawan kãfirci"

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
verses.english: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
verses.hausa: "Ya Ubanginjina! Ka yi mini gãfara (ni) da mahaifana biyu, da wanda ya shiga gidana, yana mai ĩmãni, da mũminai maza da mũminai mãtã, kuma kada Ka ƙãrã wa azzãlumai kõme sai halaka."
